Following your own wishes and 'belief'. That was really cool.

name: Jagannath
text:
You might not have been able to find their next home or goal just yet,
but you've certainly helped them, and it's a good experience on its own.

name: Jagannath
text:
By the time this festival is over,
they'll have changed even more, and so will you.

name: Baphomet
text:
You look like you would be a good counselor too.
I am sure you would be a very unconventional... but good counselor.

name: Jagannath
text:
Heh, wearing two hats is my limit!
But I might rely on you if I ever quit the police.

name: Baphomet
text:
Please have my gratitude too, [Player]-sama.
It was a big help that you reached out to everyone.

options.text: It's mostly Jagannath's achievement.
I'm glad I could help.
Baphomet, you moved the children yourself.

name: Baphomet
text:
Your buddy relationship has turned out to be very interesting.
I myself have become very interested in you as well, [Player]-sama.

name: Baphomet
text:
How about we talk for a bit?
Things about yourself— If you could tell me about those.

A 'bewitching' smile is directed at [Player].
Those words carried a mysterious magic that could never be refused.

name: Y'golonac
text:
[Player]~, Uncle's got a sinful Christmas meal that'll
make you lose your sanity... Wait, where did they go?

name: Baphomet
text:
...What a lovely evening. I feel like getting
on a float and feeling the cold night breeze.

name: Baphomet
text:
Thank you again for today, [Player]-sama.
Despite of my hesitation, I am glad to have been a part of the festival.

name: Baphomet
text:
But I would never expect―
That not only the children, but even I would be changed...

name: Baphomet
text:
Ever since I met you...
I feel like... a rapid change is happening inside me.

note:
I hate how they store their backgrounds
I can't find the variant with the cart

options.text: I think you've changed too, Baphomet.
You've become even more attractive than before.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, I did not mean it that way...
But if you say so, then perhaps it is like that?

options.text: I'm sure it's a good change.

name: Baphomet
text:
Fufu, but you are quite an eccentric person yourself, are you not?
To ask a Santa to help children— who has attacked a Santa.

name: Baphomet
text:
From what I have heard, Choji-sama also has a deep connection
with the Santas. To be blunt, I think it was quite a crazy situation.

options.text: It's the 'suspicion of attack', right?
N-No... I don't think so...
That's the usual Tokyo for you.

text:
The response makes Baphomet's heart feel lighter.
She felt like it had been a long time since she'd felt this happy.

name: Baphomet
text:
So, what do you think? If it is alright with you,
I would like to have a peek into your deep psychology.

name: Baphomet
text:
I am personally interested myself.
Just what kind of 'devils' are sleeping inside you—

options.text: With pleasure.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I would be grateful.
In return... Please let me help you to the best of my abilities.

options.text: Tell me what you see.
Will you do something for me in return?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Baphomet
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Fufufu, anything you want?
You have already known that I am 'that kind of existence', do you not?

text:
Baphomet activates her 'Sacred Artifact',
wears the Crown of Wisdom and reaches into the abyss.

name: Baphomet
text:
My... This is the first time I have touched such a complex 'devil'.
Is this... a dragon? No, that is not all there is.

The crown floating above her head shattered like 'crystals'.
No, Baphomet deactivated it herself.

name: Baphomet
text:
...No, let us stop for now.
There is no need to poke the 'bush' and let
the snake out, for the festival is still ongoing.

name: Baphomet
text:
Your existence is truly mysterious. As a result of
such a complex 'blend', 'you' as a whole are established.

name: Baphomet
text:
—Ah, the more I know you, the more wonderful you are.
May I try just one more time? This time, deeper into the depths...

options.text: W-Wait, no more than that...!?
Go ahead if you're prepared.
I want to know who I am too.

text:
In the sweet night of white breath, a wind to cool the heat strokes the skin.
There's still some time before their friends come looking—

And the next morning— At the Kiou Police Academy,
a man stood tall and straight before the Chief.

name: Toji
text:
Chief Daikoku, I have just arrived.
The reason you have called me here would be...

name: Daikoku
text:
Ah. I left the supervision to Hogen-kun,
but it seems Jagannath-kun's bad habits are showing.

name: Daikoku
text:
Therefore, I would like you to go and inspect the festival.
I might even delegate full authority to you depending on the situation.

name: Daikoku
text:
If necessary, terminate their useless investigation
and swiftly secure the suspects... Understood?

name: Toji
text:
...Yes. I have certainly received your orders.
I will head to the scene immediately.

name: Daikoku
text:
Hmph, I'm expecting great things from you, Toji-kun.
Teach everyone what the justice of the police is.

Watching Toji leave after a deep bow,
Daikoku deepens his wrinkles and wears a villain-like smile—
